title: Bug 124066: Insert chart in context menu is not translated into Chinese
description: Bug 124066: In the context menu, the option to insert a chart is not being translated into Chinese.
OB: When right clicking in the layout to bring up the context menu, the expected behavior is for the 'Insert chart' option to be translated into Chinese.
EB: When right clicking in the layout to bring up the context menu, the 'Insert chart' option is not being translated into Chinese.
SR: Investigate the issue with the 'Insert chart' translation in the context menu and ensure that it is correctly translated into Chinese.
